metadata.title: CVE-2023-6740 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Privilege escalation in jar_signature agent plugin in Checkmk before2.2.0p18, 2.1.0p38 and 2.0.0p39 allows local user to escalate privileges

criterions.comment: check-mk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
